meanings.definition: To smooth or spread with a trowel.
meanings.sent1: She trowelled the cement onto the wall to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The mason trowelled the concrete evenly across the floor.
meanings.sent3: The artist trowelled the paint onto the canvas with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her words trowelled a layer of comfort over his worries.
meanings.sent5: The gardener trowelled the soil, creating a perfect bed for the flowers.
